projects.title: uf-bot
projects.description: Script to automate actions in a certain video game. It uses images to determine its next action.

projects.title: auto-mwb
projects.description: Malwarebytes auto scanning script to simulate the paid feature. Add it to your task scheduler for scheduled scans!

projects.title: Computer Vision
projects.description: Projects from Computer Vision course at CUNY Queens College. Covers many high level topics such as Fast Fourier Transform, Hough Transform, Edge Detection (Sobel, Robert's Cross), Gray-Scale detection, Morpohlogy, Text Detection, Line Detection, and many more!

projects.title: Operating Systems
projects.description: Projects from Operating Systems course at CUNY Queens College. Covers multi-threading, parallelism, OS architecture, and using the linux kernel library.

projects.title: Game of Thrones Fansite
projects.description: Final project from Flatiron School using Ruby on Rails and React. Created to celebrate the season finale of Game of Thrones. Forum with easter egg features such as voice-to-text to set the page ablaze.

projects.title: Ani-Shelf
projects.description: Fourth project from Flatiron School using Ruby on Rails and React. Inspired by Ani-Chart website. Collaborated with Norbert Lam @NorbertLam.

projects.title: Simon.gg
projects.description: Second project from Flatiron School. Created to experience using Riot Games API. Collaborated with John Oncher @Joncher.
